text: Challenge is a British television channel, launched as The Family Channel on 1 September 1993. The channel was renamed and rebranded as Challenge TV on Monday 3 February 1997, with most of the original programmes dropped from the schedule or moved to other channels. The channel mostly shows game shows from the UK and around the world, with some original productions. On 1 February 2011, Challenge replaced Channel One on the Freeview platform. On 3 December 2012, Challenge launched on the free-to-air satellite platform Freesat. == Current programmes == * Blockbusters * Bruce's Price is Right * Bullseye * The Chase * Dale's Supermarket Sweep * Dickinson's Real Deal * Family Fortunes * Golden Balls * Play Your Cards Right * Pointless * Tenable * Who Wants to Be a Millionaire? Category:British television channels Category:British Sky Broadcasting Category:1993 establishments in the United Kingdom
title: Challenge (TV channel)
